title: A cycling app: organize rides & manages fitness activity
content: A cycle is a service app that Manages your fitness with daily activity, Organize rides, and provides facelites to buy an cycle.

title: Digital Store: e-commerce app
content: Digital Store- Company that provides service to the local stores and end-users to Manage orders and do Pre-order anything from the nearest store.

title: Wires2Visual: Service website
content: Wires2Visual provides services to build data-heavy apps from concept to completion.
